import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import rootReducer from'./reducers/rootReducer';import reduxImmutableStateInvariant from'redux-immutable-state-invariant';import thunk from'redux-thunk';var configureStore=function configureStore(initialState){//add support to redux-dev-tools
